answers.author: Robert Carty
answers.text:
I know San Jose launched a program based on the Frans Johansson model of Medici Experience Workshops: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=544NHyliSgk.  He talks about ideas like this in his conversation with Bob O'Neill at http://icma.org/leadingideas. Not all communities could afford a consultant-led program like this, but there are a lot of great DIY ideas.

author: Leslie Beauregard
text:
Some staff at our city is exploring Innovation and Resource Teams (2 separate teams) that would foster innovation and participation by City staff, and citizens for that matter, in helping the City do we what do better.  
What localities have Innovation Teams in place and would share with me their role, processes, resources  - any information at all would be helpful. We are still in the beginning phases of this concept.  
Thank you!
title: Innovation and Resource Teams
